entry.title: About Me
entry.summary:
About Me

Welcome ğŸ‘‹

Hello buddies! Welcome to my Blog!

ğŸ¤Ÿ Briefly Intro

I am a coder with strong interests in software development, especially in the field of Web applications development and implementation. I have a good foundation in Typescript and JavaScript. And I used to work at Bytedance and Tencent as a Web Frontend Engineer. In addition, I am not a boy who only gets addicted to coding. I have a lot of hobbies and I believe that enjoying our lives is one of the happiest things in the world!

entry.title: Notice
entry.summary:
Notice

6/19/2023

The English version of the blog was only recently built. All my articles and study notes were recorded in Chinese, so there is currently no English version of the historical blog.

But it's a milestone! From now on, I will write in bilingual and update simultaneously!

If you want to view my historical articles now, welcome to the Chinese version!
entry.content:
Notice

6/19/2023

The English version of the blog was only recently built. All my articles and study notes were recorded in Chinese, so there is currently no English version of the historical blog.

But it's a milestone! From now on, I will write in bilingual and update simultaneously!

If you want to view my historical articles now, welcome to the Chinese version!
